comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Generalmajor Georg von Gersdorff, Infanterie-Brigade Nr. 63 - Bautzen (according to home.comcast.net/~jcviser/army/OBc.htm) i could not find much about him, unless he was involved in a combat at Hurtebise, France (www.stahlgewitter.com/weltkrieg/1915_hurtebise.htm, in german)
